name: adexchangebuyer
title: Ad Exchange Buyer API
description: Accesses your bidding-account information, submits creatives for validation, finds available direct deals, and retrieves performance reports.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

schemas.name: CreativesList
schemas.desc: The creatives feed lists the active creatives for the Ad Exchange buyer accounts that the user has access to. Each entry in the feed corresponds to a single creative.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: A list of creatives.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: Continuation token used to page through creatives. To retrieve the next page of results, set the next request's "pageToken" value to this.

schemas.name: DirectDeal
schemas.desc: The configuration data for an Ad Exchange direct deal.

fields.name: endTime
fields.desc: End time for when this deal stops being active. If not set then this deal is valid until manually disabled by the publisher. In seconds since the epoch.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

fields.name: publisherBlocksOverriden
fields.desc: If true, the publisher has opted to have their blocks ignored when a creative is bid with for this deal.

fields.name: sellerNetwork
fields.desc: The name of the publisher offering this direct deal.

fields.name: advertiser
fields.desc: The name of the advertiser this deal is for.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: Deal id.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Deal name.

fields.name: currencyCode
fields.desc: The currency code that applies to the fixed_cpm value. If not set then assumed to be USD.

fields.name: allowsAlcohol
fields.desc: Whether the publisher for this deal is eligible for alcohol ads.

fields.name: buyerAccountId
fields.desc: The account id that this deal was negotiated for. It is either the buyer or the client that this deal was negotiated on behalf of.

fields.name: dealTier
fields.desc: The deal type such as programmatic reservation or fixed price and so on.

fields.name: fixedCpm
fields.desc: The fixed price for this direct deal. In cpm micros of currency according to currency_code. If set, then this deal is eligible for the fixed price tier of buying (highest priority, pay exactly the configured fixed price).

fields.name: privateExchangeMinCpm
fields.desc: The minimum price for this direct deal. In cpm micros of currency according to currency_code. If set, then this deal is eligible for the private exchange tier of buying (below fixed price priority, run as a second price auction).

fields.name: startTime
fields.desc: Start time for when this deal becomes active. If not set then this deal is active immediately upon creation. In seconds since the epoch.

fields.name: accountId
fields.desc: The account id of the buyer this deal is for.

schemas.name: PerformanceReport
schemas.desc: The configuration data for an Ad Exchange performance report list.

fields.name: region
fields.desc: The trading location of this data.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

fields.name: latency95thPercentile
fields.desc: The 95th percentile round trip latency(ms) as perceived from Google servers for the duration period covered by the report.

fields.name: hostedMatchStatusRate
fields.desc: Average QPS for hosted match operations.

fields.name: inventoryMatchRate
fields.desc: The number of potential queries based on your pretargeting settings.

fields.name: noQuotaInRegion
fields.desc: Rate of various quota account statuses per quota check.

fields.name: quotaConfiguredLimit
fields.desc: The configured quota limits for this account.

fields.name: bidRate
fields.desc: The number of bid responses with an ad.

fields.name: creativeStatusRate
fields.desc: Rate of ads with a given status. Please refer to the creative-status-codes.txt file for different statuses.

fields.name: pixelMatchRequests
fields.desc: Average QPS for pixel match requests from clients.

fields.name: pixelMatchResponses
fields.desc: Average QPS for pixel match responses from clients.

fields.name: calloutStatusRate
fields.desc: Rate of various prefiltering statuses per match. Please refer to the callout-status-codes.txt file for different statuses.

fields.name: outOfQuota
fields.desc: Rate of various quota account statuses per quota check.

fields.name: filteredBidRate
fields.desc: The number of bid responses that were filtered due to a policy violation or other errors.

fields.name: latency50thPercentile
fields.desc: The 50th percentile round trip latency(ms) as perceived from Google servers for the duration period covered by the report.

fields.name: latency85thPercentile
fields.desc: The 85th percentile round trip latency(ms) as perceived from Google servers for the duration period covered by the report.

fields.name: quotaThrottledLimit
fields.desc: The throttled quota limits for this account.

fields.name: successfulRequestRate
fields.desc: The number of properly formed bid responses received by our servers within the deadline.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.desc: The unix timestamp of the starting time of this performance data.

fields.name: bidRequestRate
fields.desc: The number of bid requests sent to your bidder.

fields.name: cookieMatcherStatusRate
fields.desc: Average QPS for cookie matcher operations.

fields.name: unsuccessfulRequestRate
fields.desc: The number of bid responses that were unsuccessful due to timeouts, incorrect formatting, etc.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: A list of pretargeting configs

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

schemas.name: Budget
schemas.desc: The configuration data for Ad Exchange RTB - Budget API.

fields.name: accountId
fields.desc: The id of the account. This is required for get and update requests.

fields.name: billingId
fields.desc: The billing id to determine which adgroup to provide budget information for. This is required for get and update requests.

fields.name: budgetAmount
fields.desc: The daily budget amount in unit amount of the account currency to apply for the billingId provided. This is required for update requests.

fields.name: currencyCode
fields.desc: The currency code for the buyer. This cannot be altered here.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The unique id that describes this item.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of the resource, i.e. "adexchangebuyer#budget".

schemas.name: Creative
schemas.desc: A creative and its classification data.

fields.name: agencyId
fields.desc: The agency id for this creative.

fields.name: disapprovalReasons
fields.desc: The reasons for disapproval, if any. Note that not all disapproval reasons may be categorized, so it is possible for the creative to have a status of DISAPPROVED with an empty list for disapproval_reasons. In this case, please reach out to your TAM to help debug the issue. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

fields.name: details
fields.desc: Additional details about the reason for disapproval.

fields.name: reason
fields.desc: The categorized reason for disapproval.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

fields.name: version
fields.desc: The version for this creative. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

fields.name: HTMLSnippet
fields.desc: The HTML snippet that displays the ad when inserted in the web page. If set, videoURL should not be set.

fields.name: advertiserName
fields.desc: The name of the company being advertised in the creative.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: Ad height.

fields.name: attribute
fields.desc: All attributes for the ads that may be shown from this snippet.

fields.name: buyerCreativeId
fields.desc: A buyer-specific id identifying the creative in this ad.

fields.name: corrections
fields.desc: Shows any corrections that were applied to this creative. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

fields.name: details
fields.desc: Additional details about the correction.

fields.name: reason
fields.desc: The type of correction that was applied to the creative.

fields.name: nativeAd
fields.desc: If nativeAd is set, HTMLSnippet and videoURL should not be set.

fields.name: logo
fields.desc: A smaller image, for the advertiser logo.

fields.name: store
fields.desc: The URL to the app store to purchase/download the promoted app.

fields.name: body
fields.desc: A long description of the ad.

fields.name: callToAction
fields.desc: A label for the button that the user is supposed to click.

fields.name: headline
fields.desc: A short title for the ad.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: A large image.

fields.name: impressionTrackingUrl
fields.desc: The URLs are called when the impression is rendered.

fields.name: appIcon
fields.desc: The app icon, for app download ads.

fields.name: clickTrackingUrl
fields.desc: The URL to use for click tracking.

fields.name: price
fields.desc: The price of the promoted app including the currency info.

fields.name: starRating
fields.desc: The app rating in the app store. Must be in the range [0-5].

fields.name: productCategories
fields.desc: Detected product categories, if any. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

fields.name: status
fields.desc: Creative serving status. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

fields.name: vendorType
fields.desc: All vendor types for the ads that may be shown from this snippet.

fields.name: videoURL
fields.desc: The URL to fetch a video ad. If set, HTMLSnippet and the nativeAd should not be set.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: Ad width.

fields.name: accountId
fields.desc: Account id.

fields.name: advertiserId
fields.desc: Detected advertiser id, if any. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

fields.name: apiUploadTimestamp
fields.desc: The last upload timestamp of this creative if it was uploaded via API. Read-only. The value of this field is generated, and will be ignored for uploads. (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

fields.name: clickThroughUrl
fields.desc: The set of destination urls for the snippet.

fields.name: filteringReasons
fields.desc: The filtering reasons for the creative. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

fields.name: date
fields.desc: The date in ISO 8601 format for the data. The data is collected from 00:00:00 to 23:59:59 in PST.

fields.name: reasons
fields.desc: The filtering reasons.

fields.name: filteringCount
fields.desc: The number of times the creative was filtered for the status. The count is aggregated across all publishers on the exchange.

fields.name: filteringStatus
fields.desc: The filtering status code. Please refer to the creative-status-codes.txt file for different statuses.

fields.name: impressionTrackingUrl
fields.desc: The set of urls to be called to record an impression.

fields.name: restrictedCategories
fields.desc: All restricted categories for the ads that may be shown from this snippet.

fields.name: sensitiveCategories
fields.desc: Detected sensitive categories, if any. Read-only. This field should not be set in requests.

schemas.name: BillingInfo
schemas.desc: The configuration data for an Ad Exchange billing info.

fields.name: accountId
fields.desc: Account id.

fields.name: accountName
fields.desc: Account name.

fields.name: billingId
fields.desc: A list of adgroup IDs associated with this particular account. These IDs may show up as part of a realtime bidding BidRequest, which indicates a bid request for this account.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

schemas.name: BillingInfoList
schemas.desc: A billing info feed lists Billing Info the Ad Exchange buyer account has access to. Each entry in the feed corresponds to a single billing info.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: A list of billing info relevant for your account.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

schemas.name: DirectDealsList
schemas.desc: A direct deals feed lists Direct Deals the Ad Exchange buyer account has access to. This includes direct deals set up for the buyer account as well as its merged stream seats.

fields.name: directDeals
fields.desc: A list of direct deals relevant for your account.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

schemas.name: PerformanceReportList
schemas.desc: The configuration data for an Ad Exchange performance report list.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

fields.name: performanceReport
fields.desc: A list of performance reports relevant for the account.

fields.name: billingId
fields.desc: The id for billing purposes, provided for reference. Leave this field blank for insert requests; the id will be generated automatically.

fields.name: excludedPlacements
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these placements will not match.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: The type of the placement.

fields.name: token
fields.desc: The value of the placement. Interpretation depends on the placement type, e.g. URL for a site placement, channel name for a channel placement, app id for a mobile app placement.

fields.name: mobileOperatingSystemVersions
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these mobile operating system version ids will match. Values are from mobile-os.csv in the downloadable files section.

fields.name: excludedVerticals
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these vertical ids will not match. Values are from the publisher-verticals.txt file in the downloadable files section.

fields.name: mobileCarriers
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these mobile carrier ids will match. Values are from mobile-carriers.csv in the downloadable files section.

fields.name: placements
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these placements will match.

fields.name: token
fields.desc: The value of the placement. Interpretation depends on the placement type, e.g. URL for a site placement, channel name for a channel placement, app id for a mobile app placement.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: The type of the placement.

fields.name: supportedCreativeAttributes
fields.desc: Creative attributes should be declared here if all creatives corresponding to this pretargeting configuration have that creative attribute. Values are from pretargetable-creative-attributes.txt in the downloadable files section.

fields.name: creativeType
fields.desc: List must contain exactly one of PRETARGETING_CREATIVE_TYPE_HTML or PRETARGETING_CREATIVE_TYPE_VIDEO.

fields.name: dimensions
fields.desc: Requests which allow one of these (width, height) pairs will match. All pairs must be supported ad dimensions.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: Height in pixels.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: Width in pixels.

fields.name: excludedGeoCriteriaIds
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these geo criteria ids will not match.

fields.name: mobileDevices
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these mobile device ids will match. Values are from mobile-devices.csv in the downloadable files section.

fields.name: platforms
fields.desc: Requests matching any of these platforms will match. Possible values are PRETARGETING_PLATFORM_MOBILE, PRETARGETING_PLATFORM_DESKTOP, and PRETARGETING_PLATFORM_TABLET.

fields.name: vendorTypes
fields.desc: Requests that allow any of these vendor ids will match. Values are from vendors.txt in the downloadable files section.

fields.name: configId
fields.desc: The config id; generated automatically. Leave this field blank for insert requests.

fields.name: excludedContentLabels
fields.desc: Requests with any of these content labels will not match. Values are from content-labels.txt in the downloadable files section.

fields.name: geoCriteriaIds
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these geo criteria ids will match.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of the resource, i.e. "adexchangebuyer#pretargetingConfig".

fields.name: languages
fields.desc: Request containing any of these language codes will match.

fields.name: userLists
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these user list ids will match.

fields.name: verticals
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these vertical ids will match.

fields.name: configName
fields.desc: The name of the config. Must be unique. Required for all requests.

fields.name: excludedUserLists
fields.desc: Requests containing any of these users list ids will not match.

fields.name: isActive
fields.desc: Whether this config is active. Required for all requests.

schemas.name: Account
schemas.desc: Configuration data for an Ad Exchange buyer account.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

fields.name: maximumActiveCreatives
fields.desc: The maximum number of active creatives that an account can have, where a creative is active if it was inserted or bid with in the last 30 days. Please contact your technical account manager if you need to change this.

fields.name: maximumTotalQps
fields.desc: The sum of all bidderLocation.maximumQps values cannot exceed this. Please contact your technical account manager if you need to change this.

fields.name: numberActiveCreatives
fields.desc: The number of creatives that this account inserted or bid with in the last 30 days.

fields.name: bidderLocation
fields.desc: Your bidder locations that have distinct URLs.

fields.name: maximumQps
fields.desc: The maximum queries per second the Ad Exchange will send.

fields.name: region
fields.desc:
The geographical region the Ad Exchange should send requests from. Only used by some quota systems, but always setting the value is recommended. Allowed values:  
- ASIA 
- EUROPE 
- US_EAST 
- US_WEST

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL to which the Ad Exchange will send bid requests.

fields.name: cookieMatchingNid
fields.desc: The nid parameter value used in cookie match requests. Please contact your technical account manager if you need to change this.

fields.name: cookieMatchingUrl
fields.desc: The base URL used in cookie match requests.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: Account id.

schemas.name: AccountsList
schemas.desc: An account feed lists Ad Exchange buyer accounts that the user has access to. Each entry in the feed corresponds to a single buyer account.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: A list of accounts.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Resource type.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets one account by ID.

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.desc: The account id

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves the authenticated user's list of accounts.

methods.name: patch
methods.desc: Updates an existing account. This method supports patch semantics.

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.desc: The account id

methods.name: update
methods.desc: Updates an existing account.

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.desc: The account id

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Returns the billing information for one account specified by account ID.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves a list of billing information for all accounts of the authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Returns the budget information for the adgroup specified by the accountId and billingId.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id to get the budget information for.

pathParams.name: billingId
pathParams.desc: The billing id to get the budget information for.

methods.name: patch
methods.desc: Updates the budget amount for the budget of the adgroup specified by the accountId and billingId, with the budget amount in the request. This method supports patch semantics.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id associated with the budget being updated.

pathParams.name: billingId
pathParams.desc: The billing id associated with the budget being updated.

methods.name: update
methods.desc: Updates the budget amount for the budget of the adgroup specified by the accountId and billingId, with the budget amount in the request.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id associated with the budget being updated.

pathParams.name: billingId
pathParams.desc: The billing id associated with the budget being updated.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets the status for a single creative. A creative will be available 30-40 minutes after submission.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The id for the account that will serve this creative.

pathParams.name: buyerCreativeId
pathParams.desc: The buyer-specific id for this creative.

methods.name: insert
methods.desc: Submit a new creative.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves a list of the authenticated user's active creatives. A creative will be available 30-40 minutes after submission.

optionalQueryParams.name: accountId
optionalQueryParams.desc: When specified, only creatives for the given account ids are returned.

optionalQueryParams.name: buyerCreativeId
optionalQueryParams.desc: When specified, only creatives for the given buyer creative ids are returned.

optionalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optionalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of entries returned on one result page. If not set, the default is 100. Optional.

optionalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optionalQueryParams.desc: A continuation token, used to page through ad clients. To retrieve the next page, set this parameter to the value of "nextPageToken" from the previous response. Optional.

optionalQueryParams.name: statusFilter
optionalQueryParams.desc: When specified, only creatives having the given status are returned.

enum.name: not_checked
enum.desc: Creatives whose status is not yet checked.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets one direct deal by ID.

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.desc: The direct deal id

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves the authenticated user's list of direct deals.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves the authenticated user's list of performance metrics.

requiredQueryParams.name: accountId
requiredQueryParams.desc: The account id to get the reports.

requiredQueryParams.name: endDateTime
requiredQueryParams.desc: The end time of the report in ISO 8601 timestamp format using UTC.

requiredQueryParams.name: startDateTime
requiredQueryParams.desc: The start time of the report in ISO 8601 timestamp format using UTC.

optionalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optionalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of entries returned on one result page. If not set, the default is 100. Optional.

optionalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optionalQueryParams.desc: A continuation token, used to page through performance reports. To retrieve the next page, set this parameter to the value of "nextPageToken" from the previous response. Optional.

methods.name: insert
methods.desc: Inserts a new pretargeting configuration.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id to insert the pretargeting config for.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves a list of the authenticated user's pretargeting configurations.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id to get the pretargeting configs for.

methods.name: patch
methods.desc: Updates an existing pretargeting config. This method supports patch semantics.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id to update the pretargeting config for.

pathParams.name: configId
pathParams.desc: The specific id of the configuration to update.

methods.name: update
methods.desc: Updates an existing pretargeting config.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id to update the pretargeting config for.

pathParams.name: configId
pathParams.desc: The specific id of the configuration to update.

methods.name: delete
methods.desc: Deletes an existing pretargeting config.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id to delete the pretargeting config for.

pathParams.name: configId
pathParams.desc: The specific id of the configuration to delete.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets a specific pretargeting configuration

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: The account id to get the pretargeting config for.

pathParams.name: configId
pathParams.desc: The specific id of the configuration to retrieve.
